name: Death Strike Attack
description:
In this game you will be in the role of a professional gunman, received intelligence that the position of the base of the terrorists, approaching the dangerous area to carry out a crackdown. Please express your talents in this shooting game. It would be very difficult task, as the distance between you and the terrorists are very close, and you risk damage is enormous vitality. However it will also make you more excitement and more may attempt it. Accurate aiming capability, as well as fast speed quickly will be important weapons so you can finish the game screen there excellently.

Features:
- Highly colorful and stunning 3D graphics with animations
- Best fps Shooter controls for intense gangster sniper shooting.
- Top Notch sounds effects
- Highly engaging city traffic sniper game play mode.
- Multiple fps shooter engaging levels.
